hero.title: Code Comments
hero.subtitle: An IDE-like code reviewing platform for educators and students
hero.description: Streamline code feedback and collaboration in academic environments

gettingStarted.title: How It Works
gettingStarted.description: A simple workflow designed for educators and students to collaborate effectively on code projects.
gettingStarted.step1: Student uploads their project to GitHub and shares the repository with their educator
gettingStarted.step2: Educator creates a new project, adds detailed comments and feedback on the code
gettingStarted.step3: Student receives a shareable link to view comments and reply directly in a VS Code-like interface

features.title: Features
features.subtitle: Everything educators need to provide effective code feedback

serverConfiguration.title: Self-Hosted Solution
serverConfiguration.description: Deploy your own server instance for full control and privacy of student submissions and feedback.

githubIntegration.title: GitHub Integration
githubIntegration.description: Seamlessly import student repositories from GitHub to begin the review process instantly.

noLoginRequired.title: No Login for Students
noLoginRequired.description: Students access their feedback through a simple link without any registration or account setup.

projectManagement.title: Project Management
projectManagement.description: Organize multiple student projects, track feedback progress, and manage assignments efficiently.

tryItOut.title: Try It Out
tryItOut.description: Want to explore Code Comments before setting up your own server? Try the offline demo mode to experience the platform with sample projects and see how it works.

contribute.title: Thinking of Using Code Comments in Your Classroom?
contribute.description: Code Comments is an open-source educational tool developed with customizability and collaboration in mind. Explore the code, suggest features, or deploy your own instance.
